Name: Claret Cobbler
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice & fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with straws.
Review: Fortified and slightly sweetened red wine, served cobbler-style with crushed ice.
History: A Claret Cobbler appears in Jerry Thomas' 1862 The Bart-enders' Guide .
Nutrition: One serving of Claret Cobbler contains 200 calories
Garnish: Mint sprigs bouquet. Consider also topping with seasonal berries.
